SELECT /* 기존방식 */ --CASE WHEN MAX(A.CNT1) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((MAX(A.AMT1) / MAX(A.CNT1)),0) END AVR1, --CASE WHEN MAX(A.CNT2) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((MAX(A.AMT2) / MAX(A.CNT2)),0) END AVR2, --CASE WHEN MAX(A.CNT3) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((MAX(A.AMT3) / MAX(A.CNT3)),0) END AVR3, --CASE WHEN MAX(A.CNT4) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((MAX(A.AMT4) / MAX(A.CNT4)),0) END LAS /* 종전보수료 대비 증감율로 표현 2015.01.08 */ CASE WHEN MAX(A.CNT1) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(100 - (DOUBLE(MAX(A.AMT4)) / MAX(A.AMT1)*100),2) END AVR1, CASE WHEN MAX(A.CNT2) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(100 - (DOUBLE(MAX(A.AMT4)) / MAX(A.AMT2)*100),2) END AVR2, CASE WHEN MAX(A.CNT3) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(100 - (DOUBLE(MAX(A.AMT4)) / MAX(A.AMT3)*100),2) END AVR3, MAX(A.AMT4) LAS FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN A.CS301_SIR = '01' AND A.CS301_CPD = 'A' THEN SUM(B.CS302_FMT) WHEN A.CS301_SIR = '01' AND A.CS301_CPD = 'B' THEN SUM(B.CS302_PMT) ELSE 0 END AMT1, CASE WHEN A.CS301_SIR = '01' THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END CNT1, CASE WHEN A.CS301_SIR = '02' AND A.CS301_CPD = 'A' THEN SUM(B.CS302_FMT) WHEN A.CS301_SIR = '02' AND A.CS301_CPD = 'B' THEN SUM(B.CS302_PMT) ELSE 0 END AMT2, CASE WHEN A.CS301_SIR = '02' THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END CNT2, CASE WHEN A.CS301_SIR = '03' AND A.CS301_CPD = 'A' THEN SUM(B.CS302_FMT) WHEN A.CS301_SIR = '03' AND A.CS301_CPD = 'B' THEN SUM(B.CS302_PMT) ELSE 0 END AMT3, CASE WHEN A.CS301_SIR = '03' THEN COUNT(*) ELSE 0 END CNT3, 0 AMT4, 0 CNT4 FROM SAPHEE.ZCST301 A, SAPHEE.ZCST302 B WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS301_TEM = B.CS302_TEM AND A.CS301_RDT = B.CS302_RDT AND A.CS301_SEQ = B.CS302_SEQ AND A.CS301_SIR = B.CS302_SIR AND A.CS301_PST = 'A3' AND A.CS301_GBN = '2' AND A.CS301_TEM || A.CS301_RDT || A.CS301_SEQ = ( SELECT CS301_TEM || CS301_RDT || CS301_SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZCST301 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS301_DOC = #DOC# AND CS301_GBN = '2' AND CS301_DEL = 'N' ) AND A.CS301_SIR <= '03' GROUP BY A.CS301_SIR, A.CS301_CPD
UNION ALL
SELECT 0 AMT1, 0 CNT1, 0 AMT2, 0 CNT2, 0 AMT3, 0 CNT3, SUM(A.AMT) AMT4, COUNT(*) CNT4 FROM ( SELECT A.CS126_PJT PJT, A.CS126_HNO HNO, A.CS126_AMT AMT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.CS126_PJT, A.CS126_HNO ORDER BY A.CS126_USD DESC) RNO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZCST301 B, SAPHEE.ZCST302 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.MANDT = C.MANDT AND B.CS301_TEM = C.CS302_TEM AND B.CS301_RDT = C.CS302_RDT AND B.CS301_SEQ = C.CS302_SEQ AND B.CS301_SIR = C.CS302_SIR AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.CS302_PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.CS302_HNO AND B.CS301_PST = 'A3' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_USD < B.CS301_MDT AND B.CS301_GBN = '2' AND B.CS301_TEM || B.CS301_RDT || B.CS301_SEQ || B.CS301_SIR = ( SELECT CS301_TEM || CS301_RDT || CS301_SEQ || CS301_SIR FROM SAPHEE.ZCST301 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS301_DOC = #DOC# AND CS301_GBN = '2' AND CS301_DEL = 'N' ) ) A WHERE A.RNO = 1 ) A WITH UR
